<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=WordSection1>

<h1 align=center style='text-align:center'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>CS 211A: Visual Computing (Fall 2019)<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class=MsoNormal> </p>

<h3><u><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Classes<o:p></o:p></span></u></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal><b>Instructor</b>: Aditi Majumder (Office: DBH 4056) <br>
<b>Class Timings</b>: W: 6:00pm-8:50pm</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Office Hours: </b>W:
4:30-5:30pm</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:12.0pt'><b>Email</b>: majumder @
ics.uci.edu</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b>Teaching Assistant</b>: Ali Rostami (Office: DBH 4211) <br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Office Hours: </b>M: 4-5pm; F: 11am-12pm</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:12.0pt'><b>Email</b>: rostami1 @
uci.edu</p>

<h3><u><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Tentative
Outline of the Syallabus <o:p></o:p></span></u></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>1)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Image Based
Visual Computing</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>a)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Convolution</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>b)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Linear filters</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>c)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Fourier Transform
and Spectral Analysis</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>2)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Geometric Visual
Computing</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>a)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Camera</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>b)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Geometric Camera
Model</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>c)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Camera
Calibration</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>d)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>     </span>Correspondence</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>e)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Stereo Vision</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>f)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>       </span>Photometric
Stereo</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>g)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Epipolar Geometry</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>h)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Structured Light</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>3)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Radiometric
Visual Computing</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>a)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Measuring Light</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>b)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>BRDF</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>c)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Color</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>d)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>     </span>Shading</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>4)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Visual Content
Synthesis</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>a)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Rendering
Pipeline</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>b)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Illumination and
Shading</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>c)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>      </span>Texture, Bump and
Environment Mapping</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in'>d)<span
style='font-size:7.0pt'>     </span>Shadows</p>
